original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1171)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(1171)@</color> <color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對目標範圍內的敵方造成法術傷害，同時範圍內敵方武將暈眩 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(129)@</color> 秒，且 <color=#ccffcc>4</color> 秒為間隔以  <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(971)@</color> <color=#13ccd7>智力</color>隨機對敵方武將周圍造成 <color=#ccffcc>7</color> 次法術傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1171)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(1171)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> inflicts spell damage on enemies within the target range, and at the same time the enemy generals within the range are stunned <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(129)@</color> seconds, and <color=#ccffcc>4</color> The interval of seconds is <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(971)@</color> <color=#13ccd7>Int</color> Randomly cause around the enemy generals<color=# ccffcc>7</color> spell damage.
